pageHeader.subtitle: >- Flash-based games and activities to assist children in planning their trip to Disneyland.
pageHeader.description: >- The Disney Virtual Magic Kingdom was an online portal for kids who were planning a trip to Disneyland. The colorful VMK interactive experience was built entirely in Flash. It consisted of a series of games and activities that would generate excitement about specific rides at the park. It incorporated video editing mashups, maps, and a daily event planner.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
